properties.address: Ealing Road Library, Wembley, London HA0 4BA
properties.description: Ealing Road Library is situated in the heart of a bustling neighbourhood between Wembley High Road and Alperton, referred to by many as the heart of the UK Asian community. We have books and magazines in a range of languages including Tamil, Gujurati, Hin
